Ext.menu.Menu Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.menu.Menu menu plain floating
[example]

/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.menu.Menu', {
        width: 100,
        margin: '0 0 10 0',
        floating: false, // usually you want this set to True (default)
        renderTo: Ext.getBody(), // usually rendered by it's containing component
        items: [{
            text: 'regular item 1'
        }, {
            text: 'regular item 2'
        }, {
            text: 'regular item 3'
        }]
    });
    
    Ext.create('Ext.menu.Menu', {
        width: 100,
        plain: true,
        floating: false, // usually you want this set to True (default)
        renderTo: Ext.getBody(), // usually rendered by it's containing component
        items: [{
            text: 'plain item 1'
        }, {
            text: 'plain item 2'
        }, {
            text: 'plain item 3'
        }]
    });
});
